title: The King and I movie poster. What type is used for the actors names?
author: Muggins

comments.content: I'm trying to put a card together for a friend and I have hunted high and low for this typeface before discovering this site. I need a good approximation at least

As you appreciate, the poster is lettering.  
Some approximates:  
\* Figgins Tuscan  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/figgins-tuscan/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317082109/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/figgins-tuscan/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/figgins-tuscan/")  
\* Antique Tuscan No. 9  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/antique-tuscan-no-9/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317082109/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/antique-tuscan-no-9/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/antique-tuscan-no-9/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/gothic-tuscan-9/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317082109/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/gothic-tuscan-9/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/gothic-tuscan-9/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hwt/antique-tuscan-9/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317082109/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hwt/antique-tuscan-9/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hwt/antique-tuscan-9/")  
\* Muskito Caps  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ingrimayne/muskitoscaps/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317082109/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ingrimayne/muskitoscaps/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ingrimayne/muskitoscaps/")  
\* Primer  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/primer/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317082109/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/primer/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/primer/")  
don
Thanks for your help. I have spent hours wading through typefaces. I'll be back here again soon as I've still got a few more to do. Thanks again.

You're welcome. I am almost certain that the lettering artist used one or more of the skeleton Tuscans as a model.  
don
